lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The government has repeatedly dismissed speculation it is considering any major change in debt policy and political analysts caution against expecting changes on the IMF issue.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The government of President Jose Sarney has gained a reputation for chronic indecisiveness and some analysts believe the government will turn to the IMF only if it comes to the conclusion there really is no option.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The resignation of Finance Minister Dilson Funaro is bound to focus attention on whether Brazil will now adopt a more flexible debt stance and move towards an accord with creditors, bankers and political analysts said.

lst.name: sentence

lst.name: sentence
